item.description:
Jean-Marie Corrois in association with Brazilian guitarist singer Carlos Kampf created new colorful French-Brazilian project. They are supposed to be really good. I never heard them but that is the word on the street. Also Deraldo will be there; he has a Samba group and is an amazing dancer.

The show starts at 9 pm. If you want to get there earlier they serve food and it is $10 to get in.

Also in other to keep this meet up going please bring $2 in order to keep this account going.

Shoot me an e-mail if you have any questions. Beijos!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: French-Brazilian Collaboration at Ryles with Samba
